parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions the author's intention to run for a public office ("viitor deputat"). While not naming a specific candidate from the provided list, the author's self-identification as a candidate fulfills this criterion.  This aligns with Article 36 (7) - a, as it directly refers to a person running for election.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The language used ("Dragi prieteni," "noi toți," "viitorul României") further supports this conclusion. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>Potentially True. The post proposes a legislative initiative aimed at improving the quality of public leadership. While not explicitly advocating for votes, the underlying objective is to present the author as a competent and responsible candidate who cares about the country's future. This could indirectly influence voters' choices.  This is a crucial point and requires careful consideration. The intention to improve public leadership could be seen as a legitimate political goal, but the method of presentation within a paid advertisement during the electoral period could be interpreted as an attempt to influence voters.  The line between informing the public and campaigning is blurred here.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents a policy proposal, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content. It's primarily promotional, focusing on the author's image and platform rather than providing balanced information.  It does not adhere to journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not simply expressing a personal opinion; it's actively promoting a specific policy proposal as part of a political campaign. The use of a paid advertisement further reinforces this.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1289211355428130</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post walks a fine line.  It presents a policy proposal, which could be considered legitimate political discourse. However, the context—a paid Facebook advertisement during the electoral period, coupled with the author's self-identification as a candidate—strongly suggests an intention to influence voters. The post's focus on the author's image and platform, rather than objective policy analysis, further strengthens this interpretation. While not explicitly urging voters to support the author, the indirect impact on electoral choices is significant.  The argument against it being propaganda hinges on whether the policy proposal is presented as a genuine contribution to public discourse or as a veiled campaign tactic. Given the context, the latter seems more likely.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Pop Sebastian Tiberiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Pop Sebastian Tiberiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (ID postare: 1289211355428130), cu scopul de a-și promova candidatura la funcția de deputat. Postarea, deși prezintă o propunere legislativă, este prezentată într-un mod evident promoțional, accentuând imaginea candidatului și platforma sa politică, mai degrabă decât oferind o analiză obiectivă a politicii.  Efectul electoral este clar, având în vedere că postarea este plătită și vizează o audiență largă, influențând indirect voturile prin asocierea candidatului cu o inițiativă legislativă pozitivă.  Cheltuielile pentru publicitate se situează între 100 și 199 RON, iar postarea a atins între 5.000 și 6.000 de impresii, cu o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt disponibile: contact@sebastiantiberiupop.ro și +40760256257.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
